sentences.cn: 巴比特兴高采烈,男子气概十足.

sentences.en: Comparison of Virile Beauty between " Twenty - four Literal Criticisms " and " On Sublimity "
sentences.cn: 《 二十四 诗品》与《论崇高》中 “ 阳刚之美 ” 的比较.

sentences.en: Elevation of building is adhered by light epidermis, light epidermis reveal virile and body - building architecture style.
sentences.cn: 建筑立面由轻表皮附着而成, 轻表皮所流露出来的建筑气质阳刚而健美.

sentences.en: He wanted his sons to become strong, virile, and athletic like himself.
sentences.cn: 他希望他的儿子们变得像他一样身强力壮、充满阳刚之气，并擅长体育运动。

sentences.en: He was rangy, leathery, sun - baked and virile.
sentences.cn: 他又高又瘦, 皮肤坚韧, 饱受风霜,而且强健有力.

sentences.en: He was virile in his old age.
His style of singing is very virile.
sentences.cn: 他演唱的风格浑厚有力.

sentences.en: His voice had a clear virile ring.
sentences.cn: 他的嗓音有一种清脆,精力充沛的回响.

sentences.en: I find feminine men very virile and macho men very fragile.
sentences.cn: 我发现阴柔的男人都非常有男子气概,而阳刚的男人则非常脆弱.

sentences.en: Mature women prefer older, virile men and skinny boys.
sentences.cn: 成熟的性较喜欢稍微长又强壮的男子,而是轻瘦小的男孩.

sentences.en: Mature women prefer older, virile men than young and skinny boys.
sentences.cn: 成熟的女性较喜欢稍微年长又强壮的男子,而不是年轻瘦小的男孩.

sentences.en: See the handsome but effeminate young man; he has no virile character.
sentences.cn: 瞧这个奶油小生, 哪有一点儿男子汉的气概啊?

sentences.en: She is both virile and feminine.
sentences.cn: 她既有男子的气概,又有女性的娇柔.

sentences.en: She loved the virile young swimmer.
sentences.cn: 她爱上了那个有男子气概的年轻游泳运动员.

sentences.en: The sword image shows his ideal and leads to virile solemn and stirring style.
sentences.cn: 剑意象抒发了词人的理想,也成就了船山词沉郁遒劲、苍凉悲壮的风格.

sentences.en: What are the lessons to be learned from the recent spate of virile viruses?
sentences.cn: 我们可以从最近的这几种病毒肆虐得到什么教训 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: [生理] 男性化；[医] 男性化现象
男子气；男子特点；生殖力
男性的；有男子气概的；刚健的

trans.tran_cn: 有男子气概的，有生殖力的，强壮的，刚健的
trans.tran_en: having or showing tradition­ally male qualities such as strength, courage etc – use this to show approval
